728701f-a.text:
(1)
175 Clinton Ave., at the S.E. corner of Henderson Ave.
(New Brighton), showing the rear of Judge Gannon's residence and
the garden.
May 28, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of a different section of the garden.
May 28, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
Another pnrtioa of the garden. The house in the background
is a neighboring residence.
June 24, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
